name: Frostlands
description:
In this snow-themed, gameboy-styled platformer, you play as a little square guy called Ico! You need to get through tough challenges within the world of Frostlands to restore the peace, traversing through the Frosty Trail, Snowy Spaceland, Arctic Crypts, and many more freezing foes await!

There are three main controlling inputs, much like the original gameboy:

WASD or Arrows - Navigate menu and movement

M or X - Selecting and Jumping

N or Z - Shooting

This game was made using Unity, Aseprite, Bosca Ceoil, and Bfxr as the main tools. If you'd like to learn more about myself, Icoso, here are some useful links!

YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL7FCx3MrwKGYFEs91Lz0yg

Twitter - https://twitter.com/icoso_games

Discord - https://discord.gg/uvMRDUW

Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated, thank you so much for playing! :D
